publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2016-12-07 10:30:04 -0800.

repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Ruszkowski was a close friend of Polish emigré writer Zygmunt Haupt, particularly during the period 1939-1947.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 25 letters from Haupt to Ruszkowski, 1925-1972 and n.d., 6 photographs, 1950-1966 and n.d., 2 newsclippings and an announcement, 1950. Also a typescript photocopy of a four-page typed reminiscence about Haupt written by Ruskowski, ca. 1987

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Note that material must be requested at least 36 hours in advance of intended use.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: While Special Collections is the owner of the physical items, permission to examine collection materials is not an authorization to publish. These materials are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study. Any transmission or reproduction beyond that allowed by fair use requires permission from the owners of rights, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/spc/using-collections/permission-publish
